Class Board

java.lang.Object
Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
Class serves as the board for the connect four game The methods are designed to help with the implement of a GUI
Version:
January 28, 2022
Author:
Calab Bahlbi

    • addPiece

      public int addPiece​(int colToAdd, java.lang.String color)
      Parameters:
      colToAdd - which column did the user try to add a piece to
      color - what is the piece color
      Returns:
      -1: if unsuccessful an int of which row it was added to if successful

      Parameters:
